findings.issue: Missing AuthProvider in CLAUDE.md provider hierarchy
findings.description:
The provider hierarchy documentation does not mention AuthProvider, but it exists in the code.

**Actual**: Provider hierarchy includes: Redux, QueryClient, BrowserRouter, ThemeProvider, CssBaseline, AuthProvider

**Documented**: Provider hierarchy lists: Redux, QueryClient, BrowserRouter, ThemeProvider, CssBaseline (missing AuthProvider)
findings.recommendation: Add AuthProvider to the provider hierarchy list in CLAUDE.md around line 52

findings.description:
Documentation lists 0 routes but codebase has 3 routes.

**Actual**: 3 routes: Home, About, VerifyCode

**Documented**: 0 routes:
findings.recommendation: Update line 54 to include all routes: Home, About, VerifyCode

findings.issue: README.md missing technologies documented in CLAUDE.md
findings.description:
Technologies mentioned in CLAUDE.md are not documented in README.md.

**Actual**: CLAUDE.md documents: Redux Toolkit, log4js

**Documented**: Missing from README.md
findings.recommendation: Add to README.md tech stack section: Redux Toolkit, log4js

findings.issue: Technology stack not fully documented in README.md
